name: Leapy
description:
First version of Leapy.

Click and drag the mouse to make the frog jump.

Try to get the highest score.

Play it fullscreen for a better experience. There is also the option to download the game.

Game is still under development, working on UI, slightly better graphics and audio.

Follow devlog for updates and info about how the game was made: https://itch.io/dashboard/game/1531719/devlog
